#summary If you have problems recording tickdata using ASP or Record

Verification :
 #  check start->programs->tradelink->tick data
 # You should be able to double-click file and see data in time and sales

Problem Checklist :
 # Ensure that you have added symbols to the SymbolList in record or your response in ASP (right click)
 # Ensure that All users have security permissions to the TickData folder
 # On windows vista, ensure UAC is disabled

Note that these steps pertain only to recording live tickdata, not to importing historical data from other sources.
